briefTitle: ERADICATE Hp2 - Treating Helicobacter Pylori With RHB-105 Compared to Active Comparator
officialTitle: A Randomized Double Blind Active Comparator Controlled Phase III Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of RHB-105 in the Treatment of Confirmed Helicobacter Pylori (H. Pylori) Infection
summary: The "test and treat" strategy for treating dyspeptic patients who are H. pylori positive is rapidly becoming the standard of care. This study will test the effectiveness of RHB-105, a new triple therapy to treat H. pylori infection in dyspeptic patients against an active comparator.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Eradication of H. Pylori
